front.title: Problem Statement: Mobile IPv4 Traversal of Virtual Private Network (VPN) Gateways

abstract.t: Deploying Mobile-IP v4 in networks that are connected to the Internet through a Virtual Private Network (VPN) gateway presents some problems that do not currently have well-described solutions. This document aims to describe and illustrate these problems, and to propose some guidelines for possible solutions. This memo provides information for the Internet community.
